channel.title: How do you: Make a snare a player/npc using a wep attack
channel.description: I'm wondering how to do this, I'm currently making a gladiator skill and so far its really good. I just need to know how to make it so that when you attack someone with let's say: Guthan's warspear, it snares your opponent every 1/5 tries

item.title: How do you: Make a snare a player/npc using a wep attack
item.dc:creator: @elite_azn elite azn
item.description:
@elite_azn wrote:

oh ok, are you working on a project or soemthing sleep, cause if you are could i like test and come up with ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you: Make a snare a player/npc using a wep attack

item.title: How do you: Make a snare a player/npc using a wep attack
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

I would just make a method …

[code]public void entangle() {
meStill();
}

attackee.entangle();[/code]

It may be different for you because you don’t have the attackee method.

Read full topic

@elite_azn wrote:

thank-you zenzie. Does that have a random thing so it doesn’t always happen? Should I make it something like:
If playerweapon = x and is attacking player
{
entanglydelay += (double)( entangleDelay * 0.05);
}
playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(entangleDelay);?
